attributes.action: Abolish tax being paid by Persons engaged in Active Service on behalf of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Armed Service Personnel and those attached to such, engaged in Active Service on behalf of this Nation, should not be subject to tax.  I am calling for tax to be abolished for such personnel from the moment that they leave for active duty until they are relieved from such duty in accordance with the length of their tour or their unit is returned (in cases where personnel are repatriated due to injury).  It is not ethical to demand such tax.
